Summary: Silver Strand Beach, Oxnard,ca...Red pulsating disc heading northbound with a flight pattern resembling a question mark...
divs: sighting detailsit was about 6:00 pm and the sun had just set and i was helping my girlfriend unload some stuff for the beachcomber bar and as i was coming out to grab the last couple things i look up at the sky and see a bright red pulsating object to the south right over the navy cbc (construction battalion corps) base main radar station located at the end of silver strand beach. i know the air traffic very well around here and as soon as i saw it i knew it wasn't any normal type of aircraft. i shouted to my girlfriend, who is a total skeptic, to come see and she was baffled by its appearance and flight pattern. it was bright red and it pulsated and as it flew overhead we noticed a red cone shaped light that seemed to slowly rotate around the object and at the same time the object itself seemed to be burning like a flare would but pulsated also....that's the best way i can describe it.... the flight pattern was in the shape of a question mark... so.. as my girlfriend and i are both walking in circles in the middle of the street with our heads to the sky a neighbor walks up and asks what is so intriguing in the sky, so i pointed, and she continues to tell me, "oh ya! we saw that lastnight.....it must be some new plane or something." i quickly replied, "i highly doubt it! our planes make noise this thing is silent!" as soon as i said that it disappeared. my uncle worked for northrop\grumman on the b-2 spirit and many other projects and knowing what flys in the air has been second nature to me. this is definitely was something i've never seen before.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Oxnard
There were no other sightings in Oxnard on or around January 19th 2013
